original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /
translated: He does not stand in the emptiness of essential nature,

original: gang gi tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe; ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do //
translated: and when he does not stand in the emptiness of essential nature, then he exerts himself in the emptiness of essential nature.🔽He does not stand in the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽and when he does not stand in the emptiness of non-apprehension, then he exerts himself in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /🔽gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas te / gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

original: @482a *// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson pa byed do //
analyzed: @482a *// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson pa byed do //
translated: and when he does not stand in the emptiness of essential nature of non-existence, then he exerts himself in the emptiness of essential nature of non-existence.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te /🔽gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te / gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: He does not stand in the applications of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed do //
translated: and when he does not stand in the applications of mindfulness, then he exerts himself in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi gnas te /🔽gang gi tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi gnas te / gang gi tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: He does not stand in the right efforts,🔽and when he does not stand in the right efforts, then he exerts himself in the right efforts.🔽He does not stand in the legs of miraculous power,

original: yang dag par spod ba rnams la brtson par byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par spod ba rnams la brtson par byed do //
translated: and when he does not stand in the legs of miraculous power, then he exerts himself in the legs of miraculous power.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi gnas te /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi gnas te /

original: gang gi tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson par byed do // dbang po rnams la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe dbang po rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtson par byed do //

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mi gnas te /

analyzed: gang gi tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par byed do // snying rje chen po la mi gnas te /

original: gang gi tshe snying rje chen po la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe snying rje chen po la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: snying rje chen po la brtson par byed do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas te /
translated: then he strives for great compassion.🔽He does not stand in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi gnas te /
translated: then he strives for the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽He does not stand in the result of stream enterer,

analyzed: gang gi tshe rgyun @483b du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la brtson par byed do //

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la brtson par byed do // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi gnas te /
translated: they strive in the result of once-returner.🔽They do not rest in the result of non-returner,

analyzed: gang gi tshe phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la brtson par byed do // dgra bcom pa nyid la mi gnas te /
translated: they strive in the result of non-returner.🔽They do not rest in the state of a worthy one,

analyzed: gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: and when they do not rest in the state of a worthy one,

analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la brtson par byed do // rang byang chub la mi gnas te /
translated: they strive in the state of a worthy one.🔽They do not rest in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: and when they do not rest in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: rang byang chub la brtson par byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub la brtson par byed do //
translated: they strive in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi gnas te /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not rest in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: gang gi tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in the knowledge of path aspects, then

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do //
translated: they make an effort in the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in the knowledge of all aspects,

original: gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: when they do not stand in the knowledge of all aspects, then

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed do //
translated: they make an effort in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so //
translated: it is because they do not apprehend form as something to stand in and to make an effort in.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang @484a *//
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang @484a *//
translated: They do not apprehend feeling as something to stand in and to make an effort in.

original: la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'du shes mi dmigs so //
analyzed: la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'du shes mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend perception as something to stand in and to make an effort in.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'du byed mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'du byed mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any volitional formations in which I might stand or to which I might devote myself.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any consciousness in which I might stand or to which I might devote myself.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mig mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rna ba mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i sna mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mig mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rna ba mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i sna mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any eye in which I might stand or to which I might devote myself.🔽I do not apprehend any ear in which I might stand or to which I might devote myself.🔽I do not apprehend any nose in which I might stand or to which I might devote myself.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lce mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lce mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any tongue in which I might stand or to which I might devote myself.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any body in which I might stand or to which I might devote myself.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i yid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i yid mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any mind that abides or strives.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any form that abides or strives.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang; gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i sgra mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dri mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang; gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i sgra mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dri mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any sound that abides or strives.🔽I do not apprehend any smell that abides or strives.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i ro mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i reg mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i ro mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i reg mi dmigs so //
translated: I do not apprehend any taste that abides or strives.🔽I do not apprehend any texture that abides or strives.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par @484b bya ba de lta bu'i chos mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: That emptiness of non-rejection on which one stands and in which one perseveres cannot be apprehended.

analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //

translated: they do not apprehend the right efforts as something to be cultivated or as something to be made real;

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang po rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang po rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: they do not apprehend the legs of miraculous power as something to be cultivated or as something to be made real;🔽they do not apprehend the faculties as something to be cultivated or as something to be made real;

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: they do not apprehend the powers as something to be cultivated or as something to be made real;

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: they do not apprehend the limbs of awakening as something to be cultivated or as something to be made real;

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so //
translated: they do not apprehend the noble eightfold path as something to be cultivated or as something to be made real.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend any of the four noble truths in which they should stand or in which they should exert themselves.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend any of the meditative stabilities in which they should stand or in which they should exert themselves.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend any of the immeasurable aspirations in which they should stand or in which they should exert themselves.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend any of the formless absorptions in which they should stand or in which they should exert themselves.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad mi @487b dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad mi @487b dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend any of the eight aspects of liberation in which they should stand or in which they should exert themselves.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend any of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption in which they should stand or in which they should exert themselves.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs so //
translated: “They do not apprehend the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, or the wishless gate of liberation, which are the gateways to the stability and the engagement.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: “They do not apprehend the superknowledges, which are the gateways to the stability and the engagement.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: “They do not apprehend the meditative stabilities, which are the gateways to the stability and the engagement.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: “They do not apprehend the dhāraṇī gateways, which are the gateways to the stability and the engagement.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs so //
translated: “They do not apprehend the ten powers of the tathāgatas, which are the gateways to the stability and the engagement.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs so //
translated: “They do not apprehend the four fearlessnesses, which are the gateways to the stability and the engagement.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen po mi dmigs so //
translated: “The four detailed and thorough knowledges are not apprehended as something to stand in and something to be devoted to.🔽“Great love is not apprehended as something to stand in and something to be devoted to.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po mi dmigs so //
translated: “Great compassion is not apprehended as something to stand in and something to be devoted to.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so //🔽gang la @488a *//🔽gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so // gang la @488a *// gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so //
translated: “The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended as something to stand in and something to be devoted to.🔽“The result of stream enterer is not apprehended as something to stand in and something to be devoted to.🔽“The result of once-returner is not apprehended as something to stand in and something to be devoted to.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so //
translated: “The result of non-returner is not apprehended as something to stand in and something to be devoted to.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so //🔽gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so // gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: the fruit of a worthy one,

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rang byang chub mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rang byang chub mi dmigs so //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects,

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //🔽koo shi ka /
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so // koo shi ka /
translated: or the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Kauśika, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: they do not join with or separate from form,

original: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not unite with or separate from form,

analyzed: gzugs la brtson par byed do // tshor ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: then he exerts himself with regard to form.🔽He does not unite with or separate from feeling.

analyzed: gang gi tshe tshor ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: chos la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /

translated: then he applies himself to mental phenomena.🔽He does not apply himself to eye consciousness, nor does he separate from it.

analyzed: gang gi tshe mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: He applies himself to the eye consciousness.🔽He does not join with or separate from the ear consciousness.

original: gang gi tshe rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do // lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /

analyzed: gang gi tshe lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do // yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /

translated: he is engaged with the mental consciousness.🔽He does not join with or separate from the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a visible object, and the eye consciousness.

analyzed: gang gi tshe mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: he is engaged with the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a visible object, and the eye consciousness.🔽He does not join with or separate from the contact that arises from the coming together of the ear, a sound, and the ear consciousness.

original: gang gi tshe rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /

translated: then he strives in the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He neither joins nor separates great love.

original: gang gi tshe byams pa chen po la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byams pa chen po la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /

original: byams pa chen po la brtson par byed do //🔽snying rje chen po la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: byams pa chen po la brtson par byed do // snying rje chen po la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: then he strives in great love.🔽He neither joins nor separates great compassion.

original: gang gi tshe snying rje chen po la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe snying rje chen po la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he neither joins nor separates great compassion,

original: snying rje chen po la brtson par byed do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la brtson par byed do //
translated: then he strives in great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /

analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa @494b de'i tshe /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed do // thams cad shes pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: then they are endeavoring with regard to the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽“They do not join or separate the understanding of all phenomena,

original: gang gi tshe thams cad shes pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe thams cad shes pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: when they do not join or separate the understanding of all phenomena,

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: then they are endeavoring with regard to the understanding of all phenomena.🔽“They do not join or separate the understanding of the aspects of the path,

original: gang gi tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: when they do not join or separate the understanding of the aspects of the path,

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do //🔽rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do // rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: then they are endeavoring with regard to the understanding of the aspects of the path.🔽“They do not join or separate the understanding of all aspects,🔽when they do not join or separate the understanding of all aspects,

original: gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: then they are endeavoring with regard to the understanding of all aspects.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed do ////
translated: they make endeavours in the knowledge of all modes.🔽PART TWO

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya gcig pa /🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya gcig pa / de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: tshor ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //

original: shes rab @495a *//
analyzed: shes rab @495a *//

analyzed: 'du byed phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

translated: If one does not engage with the notion that the condition of contact through the coming together of tongue, tastes, and tongue-consciousness is deep, one is practicing the perfection of wisdom.
